item.title: Why EU Leaders Are Having Second Thoughts About Admitting Ukraine
item.description: While Ukraine should seek and be granted greater integration into Europe, EU membership is not the right way to get there.

item.title: America’s Irreversible Goodbye to Climate Governance
item.description: Trump has withdrawn from global climate commitments before, but it’s different this time.

item.title: An Art History Primer on Drawings, Courtesy of Master Drawings Week
item.description: The historic art fair, in its 20th year, is the ultimate teachable moment on the zest and heft of drawing, from the Old Masters to now.

item.title: The Sordid Story of Trump, the Trump–Witkoff Family Business, and the UAE
item.description: Even if crypto makes your head hurt, you’re going to be hearing a lot about this in the months to come.

item.title: Virginia’s Clownish Redistricting Scheme
item.description: None of this is worthy of a state with one of the finest political traditions in America.
